src_original: dṛṣṭārthayānaś ca yo dṛṣṭasatyo mahāyānena niryāti adṛṣṭārthayānaś ca yo na dṛṣṭasatyo mahāyānena niryāti /  dṛṣṭārthaḥ punar vītarāgaś cāvītarāgaś ca kāmebhyaḥ /  asau ca mṛdur dhandhagatiko veditavyaḥ /  yo dṛṣṭārtho dvividha uktaḥ /
(Msa 70)  tau ca nirvāṇābhiratatvād ubhāv api dhandhagatikau matau ciratareṇābhisaṃbodhataḥ /  svasya śrāvakacittasya nirvitsahagatasyābhīkṣṇaṃ samudācārāt /
so 'kṛtārtho hy abuddhe ca jāto dhyānārtham udyataḥ /
